name: Maxant® PWR
description: Maxant® PWR is a silicone antifoam emulsion renowned for its excellent knockdown and durability. Highly effective even at low usage levels, it remains stable in high acidic and alkaline formulations, making it a versatile option for various applications. It is particularly suitable for use in clear products such as liquid laundry detergent, liquid dishwashing detergent, and glass cleaners. Offering long-term foam inhibition and compatibility with wetting agents, it facilitates ease in forming dispersions in all foaming systems.
